bug.description: <denchmark-code>Error: spawn bash ENOENT at exports._errnoException (util.js:1007:11) at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (internal/child_process.js:182:32) at onErrorNT (internal/child_process.js:348:16) at _combinedTickCallback (internal/process/next_tick.js:74:11) at process._tickCallback (internal/process/next_tick.js:98:9) at Function.Module.runMain (module.js:577:11) at startup (node.js:160:18) at node.js:456:3 </denchmark-code>
